articles.description: Reaction to England and Scotland's Euro 2024 warm-up matches against Bosnia-Herzegovina and Gibraltar respectively, plus all the latest football news and gossip.
articles.title: Reaction to England and Scotland Euro warm-up wins & football latest as Mbappe signs for Real

articles.description: England manager Gareth Southgate says he is "spinning a lot of plates" as the deadline to finalise his squad for Euro 2024 nears.
articles.title: Gareth Southgate: England manager 'spinning plates' before finalising Euro 2024 squad

articles.description: Defending champion Novak Djokovic shows his supreme powers of recovery once again to beat Francisco Cerundolo and reach the French Open quarter-finals.
articles.title: French Open 2024 results: Novak Djokovic beats Francesco Cerundolo at Roland Garros

articles.description: France forward Kylian Mbappe says it is a "dream come true" as his long-awaited move to Real Madrid is confirmed on Monday evening.
articles.title: Kylian Mbappe says Real Madrid move 'a dream come true'

articles.description: Daniil Medvedev becomes the highest seed to fall in the French Open singles after losing to Alex de Minaur in the men's fourth round.
articles.title: French Open 2024: Daniil Medvedev loses to Alex de Minaur at Roland Garros

articles.description: Scotland's striking situation ahead of Euro 2024 is up in the air. Should Steve Clarke turn to Tommy Conway as a late hail mary?
articles.title: Euro 2024: Is Tommy Conway the answer for Scotland in Germany?

articles.description: Dallas Cowboys legend and Pro Football Hall of Famer Larry Allen dies aged 52 while on holiday in Mexico.
articles.title: Larry Allen: Dallas Cowboys legend dies aged 52

articles.description: Enzo Maresca swaps newly promoted Leicester City for Chelsea. Guillem Balague looks at the reasons for the Italian's move.
articles.title: Enzo Maresca to Chelsea: Inside the Italian's move from Leicester City

articles.description: Jos Buttler ready to forget past troubles as England begin defence of T20 World Cup craving a fast start against Scotland.
articles.title: T20 World Cup: Jos Buttler keen to look forward as England begin against Scotland

articles.description: Afghanistan open their T20 World Cup campaign with a convincing 125-run win over Uganda in Guyana.
articles.title: T20 World Cup results: Afghanistan thrash Uganda by 125 runs
